name: OLLIE
description: Ollie rides his customized hoverboard around Starr Park, grinding rails and causing trouble! A fan of old school hip hop, Ollie blasts his favorite tunes wherever he goes. His music is infectious... literally. Brawlers can't help but dance when they hear it.
descriptionHtml: Ollie rides his customized hoverboard around Starr Park, grinding rails and causing trouble! A fan of old school hip hop, Ollie blasts his favorite tunes wherever he goes. His music is infectious... literally. Brawlers can't help but dance when they hear it.
